oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Foundation for the Prevention of Child Abuse message - Hank Snow - 1981-07-03
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of a message for the Hank Snow Foundation for the Prevention of Child Abuse, as read by Hank Snow on July 3, 1981.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hank Snow talks about the fight against child abuse -- Hank Snow talks about the fight against child abuse -- Snow talks about his own hardships and abuse as a youth -- Snow talks about launching the Hank Snow International Foundation for the Prevention of Child Abuse -- Snow talks about gaining non-profit agency status and government endorsement -- Snow talks about expanding the foundation to further child abuse prevention -- Snow talks about a nationwide media campaign to rouse awareness and talks about how to donate to the cause
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Snow, Hank;
